snippet: The State House on Tuesday approved the measure for inspections that now require warrants, and Democrats argued that the legislation would empower officials to harass abortion providers.
abstract: Arizona House of Representatives approves measure that will allow state health department officials to conduct unannounced inspections of abortion clinics.
lead_paragraph: The State House on Tuesday approved the measure for inspections that now require warrants, and Democrats argued that the legislation would empower officials to harass abortion providers.

headline.main: Arizona: Bill Advances to Allow Surprise Inspections of Abortion Clinics
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Bill Advances to Allow Surprise Inspections of Clinics
